lead_paragraph: Shortly after swiping onto the wrong subway platform, Tynneal Grant found herself in police custody and being ordered to remove her clothes for a search.

headline.print_headline: Lawfulness of a Search by an Officer Is Scrutinized
headline.main: Lawfulness of Strip Search by Police Officer Is Under Scrutiny

snippet: Shortly after swiping onto the wrong subway platform, Tynneal Grant found herself in police custody and being ordered to remove her clothes for a search.
abstract: New York City Police Officer Shaquanna White faces departmental charge of abusing her authority in relation to strip search conducted on Tynneal Grant in 2014 after Grant hopped subway turnstile in Brookyn; Civilian Complaint Review Board claims White has history of illegal strip searches.

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: White, Shaquanna (New York, NY, Police Officer)
